titleStmt.title: Humble praise, offered up in the publick solemnity, June the 28th 1660 being a day of thanksgiving for His Majesties happy restauration / by T.A. ...
titleStmt.author: T. A. (Thomas Arnold)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Greek at head of title: Tapein Ain Os.
